name: Mobile Phone vNote File
summary: Learn about .VNT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The contents of a VNT file can be viewed in a standard text editor. However, the message may be encoded using one of several encoding methods. For example, some VNT files are encoded with quoted-printable, or "QP" encoding. This encodes each character with an equal sign, followed by two hexadecimal digits (for example "=20" represents a space). Therefore, it may be difficult to interpret the text without a QP decoder.

description: Text note format used by various cell phones, such as the S Memo app on Samsung Android devices or the Notes application on Sony Ericsson mobile phones; saved in a text format with a header that starts with "BEGIN:VNOTE" and ends with "END:VNOTE."
